sys_ux_data_broker_rest.description: Retrieves PA indicator score using PA Scorecard API and breakdown for PIS for selected Portfolio (from the front-end). Scorecard returns one score for the first 5 PIS elements in chosen order (asc or desc) of score (nulls excluded) aggregated in month SUM+
sys_ux_data_broker_rest.name: InsightsgetPAscoreVCM2
